p: Our observation of the hybrid pair in May 2014 suggests delayed breeding activity of Bufo bufo causing an overlap with the normal breeding period of Bufotes balearicus ( Lanza, Nistri & Vanni, 2006; Carpino & Capasso, 2008; Guarino et al., 2012). Therefore, subsequent analyses were focused on Bufo bufo. Notably, while there is strong evidence for a link between the breeding phenology of Bufo bufo and annual temperature cycles ( Reading, 1998, 2003; Tryjanowski, Rybacki & Sparks, 2003), the same does not hold true for species of the Bufotes viridis group (including Bufotes balearicus).
